text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-imagingselection-3dgraphictype-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 6 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/imagingselection-3dgraphictype5.0.0  ellipseELLIPSEan ellipse defined by four (x,y,z) triplets, the first two triplets specifying the endpoints of the major axis and the second two triplets specifying the endpoints of the minor axis.
http://hl7.org/fhir/imagingselection-3dgraphictype5.0.0  ellipsoidELLIPSOIDa three-dimensional geometric surface whose plane sections are either ellipses or circles and contains three intersecting orthogonal axes, "a", "b", and "c"; the ellipsoid is defined by six (x,y,z) triplets, the first and second triplets specifying the endpoints of axis "a", the third and fourth triplets specifying the endpoints of axis "b", and the fifth and sixth triplets specifying the endpoints of axis "c".
http://hl7.org/fhir/imagingselection-3dgraphictype5.0.0  multipointMULTIPOINTmultiple locations each denoted by an (x,y,z) triplet; the points need not be coplanar.
http://hl7.org/fhir/imagingselection-3dgraphictype5.0.0  pointPOINTA single location denoted by a single (x,y,z) triplet.
http://hl7.org/fhir/imagingselection-3dgraphictype5.0.0  polygonPOLYGONa series of connected line segments with ordered vertices denoted by (x,y,z) triplets, where the first and last vertices shall be the same forming a polygon; the points shall be coplanar.
http://hl7.org/fhir/imagingselection-3dgraphictype5.0.0  polylinePOLYLINEa series of connected line segments with ordered vertices denoted by (x,y,z) triplets; the points need not be coplanar.

name: R5Imagingselection3dgraphictypeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.ImagingSelection3DGraphicType for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/imagingselection-3dgraphictype|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/imagingselection-3dgraphictype|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `ImagingSelection.instance.imageRegion3D.regionType`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/imagingselection-3dgraphictype|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
